Finally, a song by Daughter that I can get excited about.

Thoughts about Human, a single by Daughter.

Release Date: March, 2013

Record Label: 4AD

Indie trio Daughter have been making waves in the blogosphere for a while now, but Human is the first song of theirs with enough energy to live up to the hype.

Release Date: February, 2013

Record Label: Cobraside

Eels go through the motions on their new record, Wonderful, Glorious. But when the motions are this good, who’s complaining?!

A lovely instrumental single from Darbishire trio Haiku Salut.

Thoughts about Los Elefantes, a single by Haiku Salut.

Release Date: February, 2013

Record Label: How Does It Feel To Be Loved

Pitched between Mogwai and Yann Tiersen, Haiku Salut are a trio of Darbishire lasses with a mesmerizing sonic palate and a distinct francophile sensibility.
